title: Welcome to your new home! This is a Must See!!! As you walk into this
posting_body: Welcome to your new home!
This is a Must See!!!

As you walk into this newly remodeled gem, you'll be greeted by an open living floorplan with a large renovated kitchen, granite countertops, backsplash, stainless steel appliances, new flooring, and more.

This lovely 4bedroom - 3bath split floorplan has 2 Master suites and has been completely redone, master bathroom features a free-standing bathtub, dual sink, and step-in shower with a 2-Handle 2-Spray of Rain Shower Faucet and Handheld Shower Combo.
The home has many desirable features, all of the bedrooms are a decent size, 2nd and 3rd bathrooms have also been tastefully remodeled for your enjoyment.
This corner home sits directly across from the public Clearwater County Club, walking distance to schools, parks, shopping, and Downtown Atlan  ta, Gulf Beaches.
This is a very unique home that will not last long.
Easy to Show!
Read broker remarks.

Spectacular view from the 7th floor of this condo.
Located in the popular Cove Cay Community, 2 Bedroom 2 Bath condo, located on golf course.
Lush Florida tropical landscaping and views that are breathtaking of Tampa Bay, it is a true private paradise!
Updated kitchen with solid wood cabinetry, closet pantry and appliances included.
Kitchen includes eat-in space.
Sliding doors open from living area and master bedroom to covered, screened lanai.
Living and dining areas offers an open concept which is great for entertaining.
Tile flooring throughout.
Bedrooms are spacious, with master having a walk-in closet.
Updated bathrooms.
Laundry room located off the lanai, complete with full size washer and dryer.
Great location with easy access to shopping, restaurants, and the beaches.
The Cove Cay Golf Course is available for public play and offers membership.
Marina with various types of membership.
This is a 24/7 security gated community.
